$comment: DEMO PURPOSE: This schema demonstrates directory traversal in $ref resolution. The $id value uses './../' to establish this schema's location, then $ref uses './../traverse_up_dir/' to reference a schema in a sibling directory. This shows how $ref resolution works across directory boundaries, and importantly, how error messages report the actual file:// URI rather than the $id value.

version.$comment: This $ref intentionally traverses up (./../) then into a sibling directory (traverse_up_dir/). Error messages will show the resolved file:// path, demonstrating that SchemaPath contains the actual file location regardless of $id values.
